test_scenario: User requests password reset with valid registered email
expected_result:
- Success message displayed
- Message: "Password reset link sent to your email"
- Email sent with reset link
- User redirected or shown confirmation
screenshot_instructions:
1. Forgot password page with email input
2. Success message displayed
3. Email inbox showing reset email

test_scenario: User enters invalid email format
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "Please enter a valid email address"
- Form not submitted
- No API call made
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with invalid email
2. Validation error under email field

test_scenario: User enters non-existent email
expected_result:
- Success message displayed (security best practice)
- Message: "If email exists password reset link will be sent"
- No indication whether email exists
- Prevents user enumeration
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with non-existent email
2. Generic success message shown
test_date: Security best practice: don't reveal if email exists

test_scenario: User submits empty email field
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "Email is required"
- Form not submitted
screenshot_instructions:
1. Empty email field
2. Required field error displayed

test_scenario: Request password reset with valid email via API
expected_result:
- HTTP 200 OK
- Response: { "success": true "message": "Password reset email sent" }
- Reset token generated and stored
- Email sent with reset link
- Token valid for 24 hours
screenshot_instructions:
1. POST request with valid email
2. 200 response
3. Success message
4. Database showing reset token
5. Email inbox

test_scenario: Request password reset with non-existent email via API
expected_result:
- HTTP 200 OK (security best practice)
- Same response as valid email
- No token generated
- No email sent
- Prevents user enumeration
screenshot_instructions:
1. POST request with non-existent email
2. 200 response (same as valid)
3. No token in database
test_date: Security: don't reveal if email exists

test_scenario: User resets password with valid token and strong password
test_data:
Token: [valid-reset-token]
New Password: NewSecure123!
Confirm Password: NewSecure123!
expected_result:
- Password reset successfully
- Success message displayed
- User can login with new password
- Old password no longer works
- Token invalidated after use
screenshot_instructions:
1. Reset password form with valid token
2. Success notification
3. Redirect to login page
4. Successful login with new password

test_scenario: User enters weak password (less than 8 characters)
test_data:
New Password: Pass123
Confirm Password: Pass123
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "Password must be at least 8 characters"
- Form not submitted
- Password not changed
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with weak password
2. Validation error under password field

test_scenario: Password and confirm password don't match
test_data:
New Password: Password123!
Confirm Password: Different123!
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "Passwords do not match"
- Form not submitted
- Password not changed
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with mismatched passwords
2. Validation error displayed

test_scenario: User tries to reset password with expired token
expected_result:
- Error message displayed
- Message: "Reset link has expired" or "Invalid token"
- Password not changed
- User directed to request new reset link
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with expired token
2. Error message
3. Link to forgot password page

test_scenario: Reset password with valid token via API
expected_result:
- HTTP 200 OK
- Response: { "success": true "message": "Password reset successful" }
- Password updated in database
- Token invalidated
- User can login with new password
screenshot_instructions:
1. POST request with valid token
2. 200 response
3. Database showing updated password
4. Token marked as used

test_scenario: Reset password with invalid or expired token via API
expected_result:
- HTTP 400 Bad Request
- Error: "Invalid or expired reset token"
- Password not changed
- No database update
screenshot_instructions:
1. POST request with invalid token
2. 400 response
3. Error message
4. Database unchanged

test_scenario: Reset password with weak password via API
expected_result:
- HTTP 400 Bad Request
- Error: "Password must be at least 8 characters"
- Password not changed
- Validation error returned
screenshot_instructions:
1. POST request with weak password
2. 400 response
3. Validation error details

test_scenario: Event creator sends message to attendees with valid data
test_data:
Logged in as: Event Creator
Subject: Important Update (under 200 chars)
Message: Valid message content (under 2000 chars)
expected_result:
- Message sent successfully
- Success notification showing number of recipients
- All registered attendees receive email
- Message recorded in system
screenshot_instructions:
1. Event message form
2. Success notification with recipient count
3. Email inbox of attendee
4. Message history in system

test_scenario: User enters subject exceeding 200 characters
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "Subject must be 200 characters or less"
- Character counter shows exceeded limit
- Form not submitted
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with long subject
2. Character counter showing excess
3. Validation error message

test_scenario: User enters message exceeding 2000 characters
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "Message must be 2000 characters or less"
- Character counter shows exceeded limit
- Form not submitted
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with long message
2. Character counter showing excess
3. Validation error message

test_scenario: Non-creator tries to access message form
test_data:
Logged in as: Regular User (not event creator)
Event: Created by another user
expected_result:
- Message form not visible
- Send message button not shown
- If accessed directly: 403 error or redirect
screenshot_instructions:
1. Event details page showing no message button
2. 403 error if attempted via URL

test_scenario: Event creator sends message via API
test_data:
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer [CREATOR_TOKEN]

Path: /events/[EVENT_ID]/send-message

Body:
{
  "subject": "Important Update"
  "message": "Meeting location has changed"
}
expected_result:
- HTTP 200 OK
- Response: { "success": true "recipientCount": number }
- Emails sent to all registered attendees
- Message recorded in database
screenshot_instructions:
1. POST request with valid data
2. 200 response with recipient count
3. Database message record
4. Email sent confirmation

test_scenario: Non-creator tries to send message via API
test_data:
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer [NON_CREATOR_TOKEN]

Path: /events/[EVENT_ID]/send-message

Body:
{
  "subject": "Unauthorized Message"
  "message": "Should not send"
}
expected_result:
- HTTP 403 Forbidden
- Error: "Only event creator can send messages to attendees"
- No emails sent
- No database record
screenshot_instructions:
1. Request with non-creator token
2. 403 response
3. Permission error
4. No emails sent

test_scenario: Send message with empty subject or message via API
expected_result:
- HTTP 400 Bad Request
- Error: "Subject and message are required"
- No emails sent
- Validation error returned
screenshot_instructions:
1. Request with empty fields
2. 400 response
3. Validation error details

test_scenario: User creates event with valid attachments
test_data:
Logged in as: User
Files: 1 or more valid files (PDF JPG etc.)
File sizes: All < 10MB
expected_result:
- Event created successfully
- Attachments uploaded and saved
- Files visible in event details
- Download links available
screenshot_instructions:
1. Create event form with file uploads
2. Success notification
3. Event details showing attachments
4. Downloadable attachment links

test_scenario: User tries to submit event without attachments
test_data:
Logged in as: User
Files: [none selected]
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "At least one attachment is required"
- Form not submitted
- Event not created
- Error highlighted in red
screenshot_instructions:
1. Create event form with no files
2. Validation error message
3. Form state showing error

test_scenario: User tries to upload file larger than 10MB
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "File size must be less than 10MB" or similar
- File not uploaded
- Form shows error
- File rejected
screenshot_instructions:
1. File upload attempt with large file
2. Error message displayed
3. File not added to upload list

test_scenario: User sets max attendees within location capacity
test_data:
Logged in as: User
Location: Main Hall (capacity: 200)
Max Attendees: 150
expected_result:
- Event created successfully
- Max attendees accepted
- No validation error
- Capacity hint shown: "Location capacity: 200"
screenshot_instructions:
1. Create event form
2. Location selected showing capacity
3. Max attendees within limit
4. Success notification

test_scenario: User sets max attendees exceeding location capacity
test_data:
Logged in as: User
Location: Small Room (capacity: 50)
Max Attendees: 100
expected_result:
- Validation error shown
- Message: "Maximum attendees cannot exceed location capacity"
- Form not submitted
- Error highlighted
- Capacity hint shown
screenshot_instructions:
1. Create event form
2. Max attendees exceeding location capacity
3. Validation error message in red
4. Capacity hint: "Location capacity: 50"

test_scenario: User enters max attendees of 150 for location with capacity 100
expected_result:
- Validation error displayed
- Message: "Maximum attendees cannot exceed location capacity (100)"
- Input field shows error state
- Form submission blocked
screenshot_instructions:
1. Form with capacity mismatch
2. Error message with capacity shown
3. Red border on input field

test_scenario: Event creator exports attendees list with registrations
test_data:
Logged in as: Event Creator
Event: Has registered attendees
expected_result:
- CSV file downloaded successfully
- Filename: [event-title]-attendees.csv
- Contains attendee data: name email registration status
- File opens correctly in Excel/Sheets
screenshot_instructions:
1. Event details page with Export button
2. File download dialog
3. CSV file content in Excel/Sheets

test_scenario: Export attendees for event with no registrations
test_data:
Logged in as: Event Creator
Event: No registered attendees
expected_result:
- Appropriate message or empty CSV
- User notified of no attendees
- Or CSV with headers only
screenshot_instructions:
1. Event with no attendees
2. Export button clicked
3. Message or empty CSV result

test_scenario: Non-creator tries to export attendees

test_scenario: Non-creator tries to export attendees via API

test_scenario: Export all events CSV via API

test_scenario: User navigates between pages using next/previous buttons
expected_result:
- Clicking Next loads page 2
- Data updates to show items 11-20
- Page indicator updates
- Previous button becomes enabled
- URL may update with page parameter
screenshot_instructions:
1. List page showing page 1
2. Next button clicked
3. Page 2 data displayed
4. Updated pagination controls

test_scenario: User changes items per page from dropdown
test_data:
Current: 10 items per page
Change to: 50 items per page
expected_result:
- Page reloads with 50 items
- Pagination controls update
- Shows: "Showing 1-50 of X results"
- Total pages reduced
- Returns to page 1
screenshot_instructions:
1. Items per page dropdown
2. Select 50 option
3. Page showing 50 items
4. Updated pagination info

test_scenario: User clicks specific page number
expected_result:
- Page 5 loads
- Shows items 41-50 (if 10 per page)
- Page 5 highlighted in pagination
- Correct data range displayed
- URL updates to ?page=5
screenshot_instructions:
1. Pagination showing page numbers
2. Click page 5
3. Page 5 data shown
4. Page 5 highlighted

test_scenario: User is on last page and tries to click Next
expected_result:
- Next button is disabled
- No action occurs on click
- User remains on last page
- Visual indication (grayed out button)
screenshot_instructions:
1. Last page of results
2. Next button disabled/grayed
3. No page change on attempt
